net.sf.kdgcommons.buffer.MappedFileBuffer

  • Packages that use MappedFileBuffer 
    Package Description
    net.sf.kdgcommons.buffer
    Classes for working with java.nio.ByteBuffers and their close kin.

    • Uses of MappedFileBuffer in net.sf.kdgcommons.buffer

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MappedFileBuffer MappedFileBuffer.clone()
      Creates a new buffer referencing the same file, but with a copy of the original underlying mappings.
      protected MappedFileBuffer MappedFileBufferThreadLocal.initialValue()
